key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on global supply chain and recent chip shortages
Litigation and legal liabilities from ongoing investigations by law firms
Economic sensitivity to fluctuations in IT spending during downturns
Intense competitive pressure in the technology reseller market
Regulatory risks from stringent requirements in government and healthcare sectors
controversies: Ongoing legal investigations by Schall Law Firm and Portnoy Law
Recent underperformance of stock compared to sector benchmarks
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability initiatives and reducing carbon footprint
governance_issues: Potential financial and reputational damage from legal liabilities
